page.title: 10GAMES:SCHOOL
page.content: There are lots of different games that our school play in playtimes.My favourite game is rounders.A lot of people like rounders.Here are some of the games we play: rounders, cricket, hopscotch, skipping games, ball games, chase and off ground touch.Most people in our class like rounders and cricket best.We have in our school a football and netball team.On Wednesday afternoons the boys go up to the village playing field to play football or cricket.The girls usually stay at school and play netball on the playground.In the summer they play rounders or short tennis. Every week we go to the Strode Swimming Pool in Street.There is a very shallow pool for the ones who are learning to swim and a much bigger, deeper pool for those who are better swimmers.
